Verses: 1 en Magane, Nee Un Snegidhanukkaagap Pinaippattu, Anniyanukkuk Kaiyadiththukkoduththaayaanaal,
2 nee Un Vaaimozhigalaal Sikkundaai, Un Vaayin Vaarththaigalaal Pidipattaai,
3 ippozhudhu En Magane, Un Snegidhanudaiya Kaiyil Nee Agappattukkondapadiyaal, Nee Unnaith Thappuviththukkolla Ondru Sey.
4 un Kannukku Niththiraiyum, Un Kannimaikkuth Thookkamum Varavidaamal, Un Snegidhanidaththil Poi, Unnaith Thaazhththi, Avanai Varundhik Kettukkol.
5 velimaan Vettaikkaaran Kaikkum, Kuruvi Vedan Kaikkum Thappuvadhupola, Nee Unnaith Thappuviththukkol.
6 somberiye, Nee Erumbinidaththilpoi, Adhin Vazhigalaip Paarththu, Gnaanaththaik Katrukkol.
7 adharkup Prabuvum, Thalaivanum, Adhigaariyum Illaadhirundhum,
8 kodaikaalaththil Thanakku Aagaaraththai Sambaadhiththu, Aruppukkaalaththil Thanakkuth Thaaniyaththai Serththuvaikkum.
9 somberiye, Nee Evvalavuneram Paduththiruppaai? Eppozhudhu Un Thookkaththaivittu Ezhundhiruppaai?
10 innun Konjam Thoongattum, Innun Konjam Urangattum, Innun Konjam Kaimudakkikkondu Niththirai Seyyattum Enbaayo?
11 un Dhariththiram Vazhippokkanaippolavum, Un Varumai Aayudhamanindhavanaippolavum Varum.
12 peliyaalin Manushanaagiya Oru Dhunmaarkkan Aagadiyam Pesith Thirigiraan.
13 avan Than Kangalaal Saigai Kaatti, Than Kaalgalaal Pesi, Than Viralgalaal Podhanaiseygiraan.
14 avan Irudhayaththil Thiriyaavaramundu; Idaividaamal Pollaappaip Pinaiththu, Vazhakkugalai Undupannugiraan.
15 aagaiyaal Sadidhiyil Avanukku Aabaththu Varum; Sagaayamindri Sadidhiyil Naasamadaivaan.
16 aaru Kaariyangalaik Karththar Verukkiraar, Ezhum Avarukku Aruvaruppaanavaigal.
17 avaiyaavana: Mettimaiyaana Kan, Poinaavu, Kutramatravargaludaiya Raththam Sindhun Kai.
18 dhuraalosanaiyaip Pinaikkum Irudhayam, Theengu Seyvadharku Viraindhodun Kaal,
19 abaththampesum Poisaatchi, Sagodhararukkulle Virodhaththai Undupannudhal Aagiya Ivaigale.
20 en Magane, Un Thagappan Karpanaiyaik Kaaththukkol; Un Thaayin Podhagaththaith Thallaadhe.
21 avaigalai Eppozhudhum Un Irudhayaththile Anindhu, Avaigalai Unkazhuththile Kattikkol.
22 nee Nadakkumbodhu Adhu Unakku Vazhikaattum; Nee Padukkumbodhu Adhu Unnaik Kaappaatrum; Nee Vizhikkumbodhu Adhu Unnode Sambaashikkum.
23 kattalaiye Vilakku, Vedhame Velichcham, Podhagasitchaiye Jeeva Vazhi.
24 adhu Unnai Dhunmaarkkasthreekkum, Ichchagampesum Naavaiyudaiya Parasthreekkum Vilakkik Kaakkum.
25 un Irudhayaththile Aval Azhagai Ichchiyaadhe; Aval Than Kannimaigalinaal Unnaip Pidikkavidaadhe.
26 vesiyinimiththam Oru Appaththunikkaiyaiyum Irakkavendiyadhaagum; Vibasaariyaanaval Arumaiyaana Uyirai Vettaiyaadugiraal.
27 than Vasthiram Vegaamal Madiyile Evanaavadhu Neruppai Vaiththukkollakkoodumo?
28 than Kaal Sudaamal Evanaavadhu Thazhalinmel Nadakkakkoodumo?
29 piranudaiya Manaiviyidaththil Pravesippavanum, Appadiye Avalaith Thodugira Evanum, Aakkinaikkuth Thappaan.
30 thirudan Than Pasiyai Aatrath Thirudinaal Janangal Avanai Igazhamaattaargal.
31 avan Kandupidikkappattaal Ezhumadangu Koduththuth Theeravendum; Than Veettilulla Porulgalaiyellaam Kodukkavendiyadhaagum.
32 sthreeyudane Vibasaarampannugiravan Madhikettavan; Appadi Seygiravan Than Aaththumaavaik Keduththuppodugiraan.
33 vaadhaiyaiyum Lachchaiyaiyum Adaivaan; Avan Nindhai Ozhiyaadhu.
34 sthreeyaippatriya Erichchal Purushanukku Moorkkaththai Undupannum; Avan Pazhivaangum Naalil Thappavidaan.
35 avan Endha Eettaiyum Paaraan; Anegam Vegumadhigalaik Koduththaalum Amarndhirukkamaattaan.
